meanings.definition: A term of endearment used to refer to a loved one.
meanings.sent1: My grandma always calls me her little honeybunches.
meanings.sent3: When my cat brings me a mouse, I say, 'Oh, you little honeybunches!'
meanings.sent4: The baby's giggles were like sweet music to the ears of her honeybunches.
meanings.sent5: In the park, I saw an elderly couple holding hands, and the man whispered to his honeybunches.

meanings.definition: A type of cereal made with honey-coated bunches of oats.
meanings.sent1: For breakfast, I had a bowl of honeybunches cereal.
meanings.sent2: The kids enjoy eating honeybunches for a morning snack.
meanings.sent3: I spilled my honeybunches all over the kitchen floor, and the dog happily cleaned it up.
meanings.sent4: The golden sunlight poured over the fields like a bowl of honeybunches.
meanings.sent5: The smell of honeybunches cereal always reminds me of lazy Sunday mornings.
